add.description: This is the label for the 'Add' buttons.

block_element.description: Label for 'Block Element' context menu item

clickhide_instructions.message: After closing this popup, click (or right-click) an element on the page.

description.message: Ads were yesterday! The successful extension Adblock Plus is now available for Google Chrome™.

disabled_for_these_domains.message: Adblock Plus is disabled for the domains listed below. You can add a domain either via the Adblock Plus icon in the address bar or by typing the domain (not a URL) in the box and clicking the "Add domain" button.

enable_only_the.message: Enable only the filter lists you need. Too many can make Chrome unresponsive.

filter_must_follow_syntax.message: Your filter must follow the Adblock Plus filter syntax. Certain filter types, like object-subrequest, are not supported.

filters_subscription_lastDownload_invali.message: Failed, not a valid filters list

firstRun_acceptableAdsExplanation.description: This is the explanation of the acceptable ads feature
firstRun_acceptableAdsExplanation.message: Adblock Plus automatically blocks annoying ads. Adblock Plus has also been configured to allow some advertising that is considered non-annoying. These ads have to follow strict guidelines, e.g. they cannot be animated and there has to be clear separation between content and ads. By allowing some carefully selected ads you support websites that rely on advertising but choose to do it in a non-intrusve way. You can disable this feature at any time.

firstRun_feature_acceptableAds.description: One of the bullet points in the features list
firstRun_feature_acceptableAds.message: Support websites with acceptable ads (read below for more information)

firstRun_feature_betterSurfing.description: One of the bullet points in the features list
firstRun_feature_betterSurfing.message: Surf the web without annoying ads

firstRun_feature_improvements.description: One of the bullet points in the features list

firstRun_share1.description: First line of text appearing above Facebook/Twitter buttons

firstRun_share2.description: Second line of text appearing above Facebook/Twitter buttons

firstRun_title_install.description: This is the page heading on first installation

firstRun_title_update.description: This is the page heading on update

found_a_bug.message: Found a bug? Want to translate Adblock Plus into your language? Please file a request here.

global_remove_subscription_warning.message: Do you really want to remove this subscription?

global_subscription_invalid_location.message: Filter list location is neither a valid URL nor a valid file name.

last_updated_at.description: e.g. Last updated at 3:00pm on Apr 1, 2011
